#Text=Spot a Good Trading Opportunity and
#Text=Make the Most Out of Your Money
#Text=When you are starting out as a forex trader , it is important to understand the important steps you should take before deciding what to trade .
#Text=Knowing when to buy or sell a currency may appear daunting at first , but there are basic guidelines you can use to spot trading opportunities .
#Text=Steps
#Text=First , you should review the previous day ’s market activity so that you know what the market sentiment was and how investors may be feeling now .
#Text=Most traders rely on fundamental or technical analysis or a combination of the two .
#Text=Focus on the pairs you are most interested in and see how they have behaved previously .
#Text=For example check the highs and lows they have hit and the support and resistance levels they have touched .
#Text=You should also review yesterday ’s news in order to get the market sentiments .
#Text=Here , it is important to pay attention to unemployment ( NFP ) and economic growth indicators ( GDP ) , and most importantly , interest rates decisions .
#Text=Secondly , you should check the economic calendar and assess the news and announcements planned for the day .
#Text=Currency rates tend to react to economic reports as their main barometer of the country ’s economic health .

#Text=Announcements from central banks and those relating to employment may be about the most market ’s volatility so , it is important to note the time of the day of the scheduled releases and the currency pairs that may be most impacted .
#Text=You should also review the daily outlooks summaries of the day ahead that give indications of market sentiment .
#Text=Thirdly , Next it is important to check the stock market performance .
#Text=Examples : FTSE , DAX , S&P500 , DJIA , NIKKEI , AND HSE
#Text=For the past four years , price movements in most financial markets have been greatly influenced by equities .

#Text=In stock markets , full traders may liquidate positions in riskier assets and shift funds to the less risky assets seeking safe haven in currencies like the USD , Swiss Franc , Japanese Yen and Gold .
#Text=Conversely , when stock markets rise , there is a greater demand for riskier assets and high yielding currencies like the Canadian , Australian and New Zealand dollars .
#Text=Finally , you should review the technical analysis of the currency pair you are interested in trading .
#Text=Technical analysis usually starts with the identification of chart patterns .
#Text=There is a multitude of tools that can be used to interpret chart patterns that can help determine technical buy and sell opportunities based on market price action .
#Text=Forex markets often move in identifiable long-term trends .
#Text=Technical analysis can be used to spot a trading opportunity and help gauge if a trend for a particular pair may continue .
#Text=A technical trader may look at the news to confirm the strength of his technical signal .
#Text=If the news is positive , it would give further confidence in the trade .
#Text=Remember a trend is your friend and unless you are scalping the market , it is safe to trade in the direction of the trend .
#Text=Once you complete your analysis , you‘re ready to trade .
#Text=It is important that you insure your trade with a predefined risk-reward ratio .
#Text=You should never risk more than you are prepared to lose .
#Text=The ratio is calculated by dividing the amount of profit you expect in reward and the amount you stand to lose if the trade goes against you .
#Text=Profit expected/amount to lose A good risk-reward strategy should have a ratio of 3/1 .
#Text=The margin should not exceed 3 % of your total capital .
#Text=After you open a trade , it is important you continue to monitor its performance , as well as what is going on in the market .
#Text=You might want to amend the trade in response to market conditions .
#Text=Remember , the forex market is very fast and volatile , and it ’s critical to reassure your investment is protected by a predetermined stop loss and take profit point .
#Text=By doing your research and analysis , you will learn to spot trading opportunities that will help you make more from your trades .
